thread.section_title: e-Careers Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of e-Careers | e-careers.com
thread.title: Emma Womersley

author: Emma Womersley
title: Emma Womersley
text: The course had excellent content and certainly covered more than I envisaged. Everything is very easy to follow, well layed out, and the immediate "contact us" facility, if you have any queries, is fantastic. With three young children this course suited me perfectly as I was able to do it at my own pace and work it around family life. I would highly recommend this way of learning and this company to everyone.
